casebody.data:
PINE
v.
WAL-MART ASSOCIATES, INC. #1552, et al. 335A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 15, 2018 Holly M. Stott, M. Duane Jones, Attorneys at Law, Charlotte, Linda Stephens, Attorney at Law, for Wal-Mart Associates, Inc. #1552, et al. David A. Shelby, Attorney at Law, Salisbury, for Pine, Patricia. Vernon Sumwalt, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for N.C. Advocates for Justice.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 15th of March 2018 by Plaintiff:

*235"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of March 2018."
